text: Mahmut Celâl Bayar (16 May 1883 – 22 August 1986) was a Turkish politician, statesman and the third President of Turkey. At the time of his death, he was the longest lived former head of state, living over 103 years (he was surpassed in 2008 by Chau Sen Cocsal Chhum). Category:Centenarians Category:Presidents of Turkey Category:1883 births Category:1986 deaths Category:20th-century presidents of Turkey
title: Celâl Bayar
